law.text: The fiscal year of all school districts shall begin on July 1 and end on June 30.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 440, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4399-39.
